en.title: Full House at Dr Amir Farid's Seminar at Headquarter, 26th March 2009!
en.content:
A full house audience of enthusiastic FE Leaders and invited guests attended Dr Amir Farid Isahak's seminar at FE's Headquarter on Thursday 26th March 2009. Dr Amir is a well known Star Newspaper columnist and FE's Medical Consultant Speaker. Dr Amir talked on the topic "Scalar Energy for Health and Living". Dr Amir's seminars are very informative and he was able to draw the crowd's attention with many interesting anecdotes from his vast experience as a medical specialist. FE is proud to have a speaker of Dr Amir's caliber with FE! 

Read More About Dr Amir Farid Isahak.

Dr Amir's seminars are very informative and he was able to draw the crowd's attention with many interesting anecdotes from his vast experience as a medical specialist. FE is proud to have a speaker of Dr Amir's caliber with FE!
